sqls.sql: select account.NRIC_NO, org.UEN_NO, account.ID user_id,account.ROWGUID,account.ORGANIZATION_ID from ORG_USER_ACCOUNT as account left join ORGANIZATION as org on account.ORGANIZATION_ID = org.id where 1 = 1 <#if nric_no??> AND CHARINDEX(:nric_no, account.nric_no) > 0</#if> <#if uen_no??> AND org.UEN_NO = :uen_no</#if> <#if ORGANIZATION_ID??> AND account.ORGANIZATION_ID = :ORGANIZATION_ID</#if>
